hatalskan

Class ExamAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • hatalskan.ExamAnalyzer

  • public class ExamAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for generating the answer keys, answers, and exams. The class generates them by accessing the .dat files and other files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExamAnalyzer()
      Constructs a ExamAnalyzer instance.

      Creates a list from the answer key.

      Creates a list of student answers.
      java.lang.String getExamId(java.lang.String dataFile)
      Gets the exam ID, also known as the student ID, for each individual exam that was graded.

        Returns:

      • getExamId

        public java.lang.String getExamId(java.lang.String dataFile)
        Gets the exam ID, also known as the student ID, for each individual exam that was graded.
        Parameters:
        dataFile - File that contains the test information.
        Returns:
        Exam ID.

        Returns:
